verses.kjv: The LORD reigneth, he is clothed with majesty; the LORD is clothed with strength, wherewith he hath girded himself: the world also is stablished, that it cannot be moved.
verses.ct: The LORD is king! He wraps himself in majesty; the LORD wraps himself in strength and has prepared himself for action. The earth stands firm and cannot be shaken.

verses.kjv: Thy throne is established of old: thou art from everlasting.
verses.ct: Your throne was set in place long ago; you have existed for all eternity.

verses.kjv: The floods have lifted up, O LORD, the floods have lifted up their voice; the floods lift up their waves.
verses.ct: The rivers have risen, LORD, the rivers have raised their roar; the rivers surge with crashing waves.

verses.kjv: The LORD on high is mightier than the noise of many waters, yea, than the mighty waves of the sea.
verses.ct: Yet the LORD above is more powerful than the thundering of great waters, more powerful than the mighty breakers of the sea.

verses.kjv: Thy testimonies are very sure: holiness becometh thine house, O LORD, for ever.
verses.ct: Your instructions are completely trustworthy; holiness defines your house, LORD, for all time.
